page.title: 13RECREATION IN WATCHET
page.content: {SKITTLES}- My dad plays skittles every Monday in a team called Q.C.Guys. One week they play at home and the next week they play away.You need three balls of apple wood and nine{apple wood}skittles. You can play in or outdoors. My dad is in Division A Watchet League,there are 3 leagues. { {JUDO}- I go to Judo on Monday nights held at Danesfield School,Williton.The class is taken by Adrian Rowe.I dress in a{white}judo suit.I have a white judo suit with a white belt with 3 red stripes. { {GARDENING}- My mum and dad do gardening and put in potatoes,carrots, turnips and beans.They plant them in holes and put{dirt and water}on them and let them grow up.
